text.text:

text.headline: Te Arai - South
text.text: Te Arai - South built by Coore Crenshaw in New Zealand opened in March 2023.

text.headline: Te Arai - North
text.text: Te Arai - North built by Tom Doak with construction assistance by Angela Moser in New Zealand expected in November 2023.

text.headline: Cabot Citrus Farms - Barrens
text.text: Cabot Barrens built by Kyle Franz in Florida and expected late 2024. Adjacent golf course Cabot Oaks built by Kyle Franze, Mike Nuzzo, Ran Morrissett. Cabot 21 short course and practice range will be designed by Mike Nuzzo.

text.headline: Cabot St. Lucia
text.text: Cabot St. Lucia built by Coore Crenshaw in St. Lucia expected in November 2023

text.headline: Terras da Comporta Dunas
text.text: Terras da Comporta Dunas built by David Kidd in Portugal opens in May 2023

text.headline: Barbuda Ocean Club
text.text: Barbuda Ocean Club built by Tom Fazio under Discovery Land opened 2023

text.headline: La Réserve Golf Links
text.text: La Réserve Golf Links built in Bel Ombre, Mauritius by Peter Matkovich with co-design credit to Louis Oosthuizen opened September 2022. La Reserve will be the new host venue for the DP World Tour’s AfrAsia Bank Mauritius Open.

text.headline: 7 Mile Beach
text.text: 7 Mile Beach built by Clayton DeVries Pont in Hobart, Tasmania, Australia expected in December 2023

text.headline: El Desafío
text.text: El Desafío in San Martin de los Andes, Argentina was built by Greg Norman with assistance from Matthew Dusenberry completing 9 holes in 2011. The Patagonia course is one of the few Western properties planted in fescue grass and was featured in https://www.nytimes.com/2020/09/11/realestate/golf-argentina-patagonia.html The New York Times. The back nine is currently under construction now with an anticipated opening in late 2024.

text.headline: McArthur West
text.text: McArthur West built by Coore Crenshaw in Florida, USA expected in December 2023

text.headline: PGA Frisco - Fields Ranch East
text.text: PGA Frisco - Fields Ranch East is built by Gil Hanse in Frisco, Texas and opening spring 2023. Adjacent golf course PGA Frisco - Fields Ranch West is built by Beau Welling.

text.headline: Lost Rail
text.text: Lost Rail built by Scott Hoffman and construction by Bill Kubly from Landscapes Unlimited in Nebraska, USA opened in September 2022

text.headline: Landmand
text.text: Landmand built by Rob Collins and Tad King in Nebraska, USA opened in August 2022. 2023 tee times are sold out. The 17th hole green is a modern interpretation of Alister Mackenzie's lost NLE Sitwell Park green.

text.headline: Sand Valley - Lido
text.text: Sand Valley Lido built by Doak Schneider Slawnik in Wisconsin, USA open summer 2023

text.headline: Pinehurst #10
text.text: Pinehurst Resort's 10th course routed by Tom Doak, built by Angela Moser is expected to open in spring 2024. Rich LaBar leads site construction under firm LaBar Golf Renovations.

text.headline: Old Barnwell
text.text: Old Barnwell built by Brian Schneider, Blake Conannt and MacCurrach construction in South Carolina, USA estimated opening October 2023

text.headline: Tree Farm
text.text: Tree Farm built by Goalby Blair Doak in South Carolina, USA opened in March 2023

text.headline: Wicker Point
text.text: Wicker Point Golf Club on Lake Martin in Alabama, USA designed by Coore Crenshaw with construction services provided by Landscapes Unlimited opens in September 2023

text.headline: Ban Rakat Club - Ballyshear
text.text: Ban Rakat Club - Ballyshear built by Hanse in Thailand opened in January 2022
